title: "‘Artificial intuition’ delivers better answers to thorny parking-lot optimization problem"
excerpt: "Researchers have combined quantum annealing with an algorithm that tries to replicate the selective attention mechanisms in the human brain that underlie intution in order to tackle the deceptively thorny problem of where best to site a new parking lot."
